storyInfo: The temperamental Nightzmora suddenly gives up on fighting Maria, while the Doctor is the target of an assassination attempt. Gravel tries her hardest to fend off Platinum, but it seems Rhodes Island came prepared.

attributes.content: Ahh!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Kid!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That's enough. Don't push yourself—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: No... Master Vogelweide... Look at your hand...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This isn't the first time. I'm used to it.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It's over. Your strength is beyond my expectations. It was just enough to tide my anger...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You too are a descendant. I shall not take your life, but you will get out of my way.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: So you've got your heart set on dueling Margaret, huh?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Wrong. I am merely continuing a fight that was cut short.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You're stubborn and... mad. What are you looking for anyway? What is it that you actually want?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You do not understand...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Like hell I would. For that so-called tradition of yours, you gave up your whole life and everything ahead of you! It's all pointless!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Did I need you to give my life meaning?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I just don't want to see you stay on this path of insanity forever. The 'Khaganquest' is a coming-of-age tradition followed by a handful of tribes. Doesn't that make you still a child?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Gah! I am done with you. Out of the way.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Over my dead body!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: —You will regret this, old man!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Maria, what are you doing?! You're hurt—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: This is my first time to see you so worked up, Nightzmora...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The shield of a knight is meant to protect people. That's what my sister told me.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You said my conviction was borrowed. I've got nothing to say about that.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But if I'm going to be scared to walk even well-lit roads, then there's really no point in the knighthood anymore!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: How dare you spout that nonsense about knights—
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: —Sorry, but I'm not a knight anymore. I just want to protect my sister—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I can't let a psycho like you get in her way!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Arts...? It's... Hm?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A ray of light shines off the blood on Maria's face.
Fragile and insignificant. It's true. If he gave it his all, the Nightzmora could easily have strangled the pegasus to death.
He is confident of that.
Yet... why does the blood on her face... have this radiant, golden shine?
Is it the light of the Arts turning it gold?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A pegasus whose name is bound to go down in history... yet so frail... Is it a mere coincidence?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Master Vogelweide, go back without me... I'll hold him here.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Drop the act, kid. He'll kill you—!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'll stop him!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Huh...? Why are you turning around...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Pegasus.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You cannot grow stronger on the conviction of others. Not unless you truly believe in it.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: And you do not.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Dedication and sacrifice.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: These virtues border on self-destruction... and you possess them at birth. You taught me a lesson, pegasus, descendant.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Perhaps...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ...No, never mind.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Tell the Radiant Knight that my bout with her has not yet ended. I am merely putting it on hold.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Perhaps? Perhaps what?
Perhaps I would have made the same decision if I had been raised in the same environment as you?
Never allow yourself to be so weak, Tola.
Never!
The Radiant Knight, the Blood Knight... The Major has really heated up in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If we go by points and nothing else, the finals should long have been in reach of the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doesn't that make you happy?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: If only the K.G.C.C. would let Nearl take the crown.;After the Infected incident, will the people accept that?;Nearl's greatest challenge has only just begun.

attributes.content: You're right...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But even if the General Chamber is scheming something, I'm sure you and the Adeptus will help Nearl overcome.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That said, is the K.G.C.C. really the problem...? They're definitely not ones to do any work themselves. Instead, they prefer to sow the seeds... and wait for them to sprout.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Many will voice their gripes...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hehe... but that also happened when the Blood Knight first came along.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But who still remembers any of that after the Blood Knight took his trophy and the money came raining down?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: They have short memories, Doctor. No matter who ends up winning, as long as they speak on the Infected's behalf, it'll all work out fine.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Kazimierz loves its champions.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You mean... the Blood Knight? No, you wouldn't say something so skin-deep...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Whatever's the case, I believe you and Nearl will overcome.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: How are Amiya and the medic operators doing?

attributes.content: They're giving the Infected knights checkups and treatment, just as always.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is plenty efficient. I can see why the Grand Knight trusts you so much.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That said... I'm here right with you, and you haven't shown even a little bit of care for me.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That makes me kind of sad.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: You're right. I should thank you for all your help.

attributes.content: What are you thanking me for, specifically?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: For being a diligent bodyguard.;For giving us all this invaluable intel while we have our hands tied.;Uhh... for chatting with me and helping me kill time?

attributes.content: I'm just doing my job. I was given my orders, and I would go through fire and water to fulfill them.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I've only told you what the Grand Knight permitted me to say.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I'd love to accept your thanks, but it was her who truly helped Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Oh... so our conversations are just a way to pass the time to you?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Hehe, but in that case, I'll keep talking to you all you want.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: So, how will you thank me, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Pretend to take a walk outside so you can take a break and go shopping?;What are you into? Rhodes Island's got all kinds of people.;Anything you want.

attributes.content: Hehe... That sounds wonderful. I've always wanted to be a model, just once.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I may wear all this armor all the time, but I'm still a girl. I got tired of this outfit a long time ago.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That said... I didn't really have the right to think about something like this, in the past.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What I'm into...?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I've never thought about it before... What do normal Kazimierzian girls like? Food? Makeup? Oh... Let's not talk about knight stuff.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Well... as for outfits... All this armor does dampen my spirits every now and then.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Though a campaign knight like me doesn't really get much chance to wear regular clothes, either.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor... do you know what you're saying? 'Anything you want' is pretty much the last thing you'd want to say when you're being interrogated.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Most of us hand our decision-making power away, probably because we find obnoxious to have to make decisions... but sometimes... the one we give that power may have some unexpected ideas.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Well, then, Doctor... Would you lean back, please?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Uh, sure.

attributes.content: Close your eyes, okay? I wouldn't want anything to happen to them...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: And then...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor, don't open your eyes.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If you see an Armorless assassin's face, I'm afraid you won't be leaving Kazimierz alive.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: I can't let you bear all the risks.;......;I've got to at least know what's going on, no?

attributes.content: You're not just a regular campaign knight, are you?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Armorless Union doesn't hold the patent on assassination, you know?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Don't move, or I'll cut your throat open.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Now that won't do. I can't let you put the Doctor's life in danger, even if it costs me my own.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: It's just some foreign company... Is this one really worth giving your life for, knight—Hm?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The barcode on your arm... You're a purchased slave. Why so loyal to an outsider?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Unfortunately, my desire to protect the Doctor comes from the bottom of my heart.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I see... The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi arranged for a lackey like you to follow Rhodes Island around. They planned to use Rhodes Island to investigate Area 0 right from the start.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don't make our relationship sound so exploitative.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: That's right. If you gotta say it, we exploit each other.;This is what you call a win-win situation.;As long as we get along, am I right?

attributes.content: So you are Rhodes Island's 'Doctor.' There's supposed to be a Cautus girl around too...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I'm not into hurting kids. Bumping you off should do the trick, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: Too bad. Amiya's Rhodes Island's true leader.
You really shouldn't underestimate Amiya though.

attributes.content: Doctor, go on without me. I'll hold her here. Take Miss Amiya and leave this place. Look for someone from the Adeptus—
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I'm not here alone.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Armorless Union already has you surrounded... You're not walking out of here.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: It's okay, Doctor... As long as I'm here, I—
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: —Doctor?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Shielding your own bodyguard? What's the idea? You'll give your life for someone else?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Aww, so cute... I've got a job to do though.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: A mission from the Board of Directors?

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: If my guess is correct, the Board didn't give you these orders.

attributes.content: I don't know what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: Is it Mieszko Industries?;Is it Sun Shrubs Pharmaceuticals?;Is it Cloud Pharmaceuticals?
Of course, Rhodes Island is a threat to them.
But does it matter if some foreign company knows the truth?;I'm sure they have the power to silence Rhodes Island.
What they're really afraid of are the beasts sitting at the same table.;They're afraid of their fellow men.

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: I'm guessing it won't be hard for you to kill me, huh?;What's the rush? You on some kind of flexible work schedule?
Why don't you take a seat and catch a breather?

attributes.content: Do you really understand what you're doing...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Even with this campaign knight in the way, I can—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: No, you can't.
The spokesman personally oversaw our contract signing with our partners.;Malkiewicz has been very helpful.;Would you like to know, from a legal perspective, where Rhodes Island stands?

Right now, we're temporarily affiliated with the General Chamber of Commerce.;If you lay a finger on us, you're doing the same to the K.G.C.C.;Anyway, I think there's someone out there who's not about to let this chance pass by.
Of course, you people have a way to get around the law.;But under the veneer of civilization, there is a bloodbath that you can't get around.

attributes.content: A call...?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Answer the phone, uh... Platinum, right?;It's for you.;Have a nice chat with civilization, ma'am.

attributes.content: Centaurea...?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: No need to be so shocked, Platinum.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I'm very glad you haven't killed Rhodes Island's leader yet.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Call it off. Your orders were mistaken. Those morons, jumping the gun. It is not up to them to give the Union orders without consulting the Board.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: And stop the madness that Area 0 is pulling on its so-called useless Infected. Rhodes Island has opened our eyes. Their lives still have meaning... They can yet create value.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: That's all.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: You... You planned this?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: How did you do it?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.options: You cozy up to some people, and you square up to others.
Wasn't that hard.;Most people think it's difficult to even bring ideas to their bosses.
What's actually difficult is figuring out how to cozy up and who to square up to.
Thankfully, I got a friend who's a good listener.

attributes.content: So what will we do with Area 0...?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: We'll be working with too many uncertain factors if we let the two Infected knights make a big splash after all the uprisings the Infected have instigated.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: And if the public catches wind of the way Area 0 takes care of its Infected right now...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I suppose there are both upsides and downsides.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: We don't permit 'both upsides and downsides.' Whether it's good or bad, what we want is control over the matter.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I have other ways to handle this...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Just to be safe, I've already instructed the Armorless Union to take care of it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Should I let you go, just like that?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You're an outsider who knows about the Armorless Union...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don't be such a sore loser, Platinum. You're embarrassing yourself, you know?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor! I've got something to ask you about transporting today's supplies—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm? Do you have a guest? I-I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's okay... Come in.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: An Armorless and a campaign knight are having tea together because of you, Doctor. You're really full of surprises.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Um... Doctor, may I have a second? I need you to sign this...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (So that's Rhodes Island's leader... If I take her down now...)
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Naturally, she is just entertaining the thought.
Even Gravel, who sits mere meters away from her, can feel not an ounce of hostility. After all, she is merely entertaining the thought.
Be that as it may, Platinum suddenly hesitates, before feeling relieved for her decision.
She is relieved that she did not carry out her mission.
In the blink of an eye, she senses a possibility in the petite Cautus.
If things escalate, will she actually be able to draw her arrow unscathed?
Or perhaps, before that—
Hm...? Miss? Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Never mind. Please excuse me.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I'll send someone to fix the glass I broke. Time to go.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Doctor...{@nickname} of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I'll be back.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Doctor, Gravel... Did something happen?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: We had a cup of tea together. That's all.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Platinum, ma'am... Here's what you wanted.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I'm surprised you found it.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Right. We searched through the communications between Rhodes Island and the Adeptus, and we narrowed it down to this message with the clues we had.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: These are the true medical examination records of Operator Nearl... the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight... isn't Infected?!
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Welcome to the Kazimierz Major! It's your old buddy, Greatmouth Mob!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Thanks to Nightmare Knight's mistake, we're treated to today's matchup, the Blood Knight versus Nightmare Knight!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: With their terrifying auras, and might unmatched by any other, imagine the fight our mighty Blood Knight and the legendary Nightzmora have in store for us today!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Blood Knight and Nightmare had a fiery first encounter the other day! And now! They face each other in a formal match!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: There will be blood! There will be slaughter! Only the victor will get to bask in fame and glory. Let us welcome—our knights—for today's match—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No knightclub, no sponsors. Good lord, why are you people leaving that huge pie on the table?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Somebody, make him a knightclub! You'll be rolling in all the dough!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: On the other side, we have the king of blood, Kazimierz's Blood-Red Chalice, the heartless victory machine, and deservedly, the very pinnacle!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: THE—BLOOOOOD KNIIIIGHT, DIKAAAAIIIOPOLIIIIIS!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We meet again... Nightzmora.
attributes.name: The Blood Knight

attributes.content: Are you still searching for the shadows of the past?
attributes.name: The Blood Knight
